name: Sourdough Bruschetta
recipeCategory: easy, quick, condiments, dips and spreads
keywords: appetizer, bread, tomato, dairy-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 large tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped in chunks
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Pour the olive oil into a baking pan and spread it around. Coat the bread slices on both sides in the oil. Bake for 10 minutes until crisp and golden.
Rub the bread slices with the garlic. Mix the tomatoes with the basil, season to taste with salt and pepper and spread on the bread. Serve.
